    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112495</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112495</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Colours 1</string>
            <string language="en">Colors 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Färbt 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Colore 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colore 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colora 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρώματα 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colorea 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you read and listen to the English names of some of the colours. It is followed by a drag’n’drop exercise where you can check yourself on the colours.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you read and listen to the English names of some of the colors. It is followed by a drag'n'drop exercise where you can check yourself on the colors. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">colours</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">colors</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier lesen Sie und hören zu den englischen Namen
von einigen der Farben. Er wird von einer drag'n'drop Übung 
gefolgt, in der Sie auf den Farben sich überprüfen können. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous lisez et écoutez les noms anglais
de certaines des couleurs. Elle est suivie d'un exercice de 
drag'n'drop où vous pouvez vous contrôler sur les couleurs. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 -
combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você lê e escuta os nomes ingleses de 
algumas das cores. É seguida por um exercício do drag'n'drop 
onde você possa se verificar nas cores. Safir - vida do inglês
e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui leggete ed ascoltate i nomi inglesi di alcuni
dei colori. È seguita da un'esercitazione del drag'n'drop dove 
potete controllarsi sui colori. Safir - inglese e vita attiva 
per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ διαβάζετε και ακούτε τα αγγλικά ονόματα μερικά 
από τα χρώματα. Ακολουθείται με μια άσκηση drag'n'drop 
όπου μπορείτε να ελεγχθείτε στα χρώματα. Safir - 
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2
- πόσο είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted lee y escucha los nombres ingleses de
algunos de los colores. Es seguida por un ejercicio del 
drag'n'drop donde usted puede controlarse en los colores. ¿Safir
- inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto 
es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
